<script>(function(){
'use strict';
var stats = window.ttiStats = {};
var addListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('addEventListener' in document) {
document.addEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.attachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var removeListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('removeEventListener' in document) {
document.removeEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.detachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var baseTimeStamp = (new Date()).getTime();
var onClick = function onClick() {
stats.click = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('click', onClick);
};
var onScroll = function onScroll() {
stats.scroll = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('scroll', onScroll);
};
addListener('click', onClick);
addListener('scroll', onScroll);
}());

San Francisco was highly rated for sightseeing by <strong>9,281 guests from the United States!</strong> <a href="/destinationfinder/cities/us/san-francisco.html">San Francisco Travel Guide</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="lp-horizontal-section clearfix">
<div class="lp_flexible_layout_content_wrapper">
<div class="leftwide rilt-left">
<div data-et-view="AEJPCCAURAfPMbATIADDBDOLcPC:1"></div>
</div>
<div class="rilt-fullwidth">
<div id='lp_remove_city_description_track'></div>
<div id="b-city_description">
<h2 class="lp-section-header">An Icon of Liberalism</h3>
<p>Home to one of America’s icons – the Golden Gate Bridge – San Francisco is a liberal city where life is very much for the living.</p>
<p>Surrounded by water on 3 sides, the city's spread over steep hills that make for great photo ops. And none better than the zig-zag Lombard Street, seen in many a film. Even more famous are San Fran's iconic trolleys climbing the hills – a little touristy, but still worth a ride.</p>
<p>In the middle of the bay, Alcatraz island is known for the notorious criminals once imprisoned there. Even if you don’t go inside, the views of the bridge and city are unparalleled.</p>
<p>Nowhere is life in San Francisco more laid-back than on the Pacific beaches. Rent a bike and head out there, passing through the huge Golden Gate Park, before returning to sample some fresh seafood at Fisherman’s Wharf. Don't miss the clam chowder served in bread bowls! Chinatown also has a great selection of mid-range restaurants.</p>
<p>As you fly into San Francisco Airport, look out for the exclusive homes lining the Bay Area. Whether you want a more independent stay in apartments, luxury San Francisco hotels or cheap hostels, Booking.com has something for everyone. Be careful though – you might just leave your heart here!</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<h4 class="destination-reviews__title">San Francisco is always fabulous.</h4>
<p class="toggle-long-text__content">
San Francisco is always fabulous. Union Square, Powell St Bart Station close by my hotel. The diversity, the ambience, the people watching-it's just like Europe in so many ways. Go to Limon on Van Ness for great Peruvian food!
</p>

<p class="toggle-long-text__content">
Beautiful city, stunning views of the bay and Golden Gate Bridge.  Great restaurants.  Plenty to do and see - Union Square, Embarcadero, Fisherman’s Wharf, SFMONA, Alcatraz.  I am a runner, and one of my favorite things to do is run from Fisherman’s Wharf through Crissy Fields and over the Golden. Gage Bridge.

<p class="toggle-long-text__content">

<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>Location location location.  This was in the center of it all.  Union square is 1 block away.  Cable cars to fisherman warf 1 block away.  China town 0 blocks away but not in chinatown. It was really the best location for seeing all of San Francisco.  I would stay here again.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>

<li data-et-click="customGoal:IZVGPQLQBTXNcQBcbEFQHT:1" class="favorite-hotels__item   favhotels__longer-review">

Taylor Hotel San Francisco

</h4>

<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>The location was awesome, right across the road from the best breakfast in town and had a little convenient store next door, 2 blocks from union square and all public transportation, granted it is an OLD hotel but San Francisco is an old town. The hotel could use some upgrades, bed was hard and only hot water in the tub but all in all it was good and the staff was very helpful, I would stay there again<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>

<li data-et-click="customGoal:IZVGPQLQBTXNcQBcbEFQHT:1" class="favorite-hotels__item   favhotels__longer-review">

InterContinental Mark Hopkins San Francisco

</h4>
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-image">

<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>Overall I had a nice experience. The room was nicely furnished, the staff were prompt and attentive, check out was easy, and the location is right next to San Francisco's upscale shopping areas. The embarcaderro center is pretty close, and so is union square. And all the riff riff from union square kind of keep their distance because the hotel is located atop of a very steep hill.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li data-et-click="customGoal:IZVGPQLQBTXNcQBcbEFQHT:1" class="favorite-hotels__item   favhotels__longer-review">

<a data-et-click="customGoal:IZVGPQLQBTXNcQBcbEFQHT:2" class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name__link" href="/hotel/us/ellis-street-san-francisco.html" target="_blank">
Cova Hotel
</a>
</h4>
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-image">

</div>
</div>
<div class="guests-reviews__review" data-et-click="customGoal:IZVGPQLQBTXNcQBcbEFQHT:3">
<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>The Cova Hotel was a very nice hotel in San Francisco. It was clean with cozy beds, a nice included free breakfast and a free shuttle to points of interest such as Union Square and Fisherman's Wharf. It has a very nice roof top terrace with views of the city which was great for those of us who smoke. Staff was so nice and helpful..giving us directions,suggestions of places to eat,etc. The parking for your car was on site and the cost reasonable in comparison to other hotels.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>
</li>

<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>We had the best room at the Inn. We were scrambling after finding out our cruise was delayed a day and needed to spend the night in San Francisco. We are so fortunate to have found this as rooms were being snapped up quickly all over the downtown area.  This has been the best Inn we have stayed at in 30 years of marriage.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;">
<h3>Verified reviews from real guests.</h3><p>We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from <strong>real, verified guests.</strong>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h3 class="rlp-intro__title">How does it work?</h3>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">It starts with a booking</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">Followed by a trip</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">And finally, a review</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>

var sToggleId = '#blocktoggle' + sToggle;
$(sToggleId).toggle();
}
function blockdisplay(i) {
var body = $( document.body );
if (document.getElementById("blockdisplay" + i)) {
for (var j = 1; j <= 4; j++) {
if (document.getElementById('blockdisplay' + j)) {
document.getElementById('blockdisplay' + j).style.display = (j === i) ? 'block' : 'none';
}
}
body.trigger((i == 4) ? 'ReviewsTab_onOpen' : 'ReviewsTab_onClose')
.trigger( 'RT:reset' );
( booking.eventEmitter || $( window ) )
.trigger( 'BLOCKDISPLAY' + i + '.OPEN' );
if (i === 1 && typeof bMovableBookNowButton != "undefined") {
bMovableBookNowButton.init();
}
if (i == 4) {
$(".toggle_overview").show();
$(".toggle_review").hide();
} else {
$(".toggle_review").show();
$(".toggle_overview").hide();
}
}
}
function popup( url, w, h ) {
newWindow = window.open( url, 'popupWindow', 'width=' + w + ',height=' + h + ',menubar=no,toolbar=no,location=no,bookmarks=no,status=no,scrollbars=yes,resizable=yes' );
if ( window.focus ) {
newWindow.focus();
}
}

San Francisco Travel Guide An Icon of Liberalism Home to one of America’s icons – the Golden Gate Bridge – San Francisco is a liberal city where life is very much for the living. Surrounded by water on 3 sides, the city's spread over steep hills that make for great photo ops. And none better than the zig-zag Lombard Street, seen in many a film. Even more famous are San Fran's iconic trolleys climbing the hills – a little touristy, but still worth a ride. In the middle of the bay, Alcatraz island is known for the notorious criminals once imprisoned there. Even if you don’t go inside, the views of the bridge and city are unparalleled. Nowhere is life in San Francisco more laid-back than on the Pacific beaches. Rent a bike and head out there, passing through the huge Golden Gate Park, before returning to sample some fresh seafood at Fisherman’s Wharf. Don't miss the clam chowder served in bread bowls! Chinatown also has a great selection of mid-range restaurants. As you fly into San Francisco Airport, look out for the exclusive homes lining the Bay Area. Whether you want a more independent stay in apartments, luxury San Francisco hotels or cheap hostels, Booking.com has something for everyone. Be careful though – you might just leave your heart here! 뉅 뀡 뉅 뉅 덀 녴 덀 녴 Save time, save money! You're done! You can close this window. What Guests Said About San Francisco: Bethe United States of America 10 San Francisco is always fabulous. San Francisco is always fabulous. Union Square, Powell St Bart Station close by my hotel. The diversity, the ambience, the people watching-it's just like Europe in so many ways. Go to Limon on Van Ness for great Peruvian food! Steven United States of America 10 Beautiful city, stunning views of the bay and Golden Gate... Beautiful city, stunning views of the bay and Golden Gate Bridge. Great restaurants. Plenty to do and see - Union Square, Embarcadero, Fisherman’s Wharf, SFMONA, Alcatraz. I am a runner, and one of my favorite things to do is run from Fisherman’s Wharf through Crissy Fields and over the Golden. Gage Bridge. Anonymous United States of America 10 Visiting a friends and family. Visiting a friends and family. A great weekend getaway from Seattle. Enjoyed takin the ferry to Sausalito. Visiting friends in lower Haight .Lots of good restaurants. Used the Muni easy but Lyft and uber work well here too. Great break from rainy cold Seattle Marten Canada 8.0 So much to see and do. So much to see and do. Research public transportation options ahead of time as they appears very accessible, unless you like walking a lot. Rent a bike and head across the Golden Gate to Sausalito and ferry back. Lynne United States of America 10 Love the city, shopping, choices of cuisine, and the fresh... Love the city, shopping, choices of cuisine, and the fresh air. I was with my daughter, but there was no selection for a child over 18. So, I wasn't alone. Plenty of museums, places like the wharf, Market St., and walking around. Hotels That Guests Love in San Francisco Hotel Triton “ Location location location. This was in the center of it all. Union square is 1 block away. Cable cars to fisherman warf 1 block away. China town 0 blocks away but not in chinatown. It was really the best location for seeing all of San Francisco. I would stay here again. ” Taylor Hotel San Francisco “ The location was awesome, right across the road from the best breakfast in town and had a little convenient store next door, 2 blocks from union square and all public transportation, granted it is an OLD hotel but San Francisco is an old town. The hotel could use some upgrades, bed was hard and only hot water in the tub but all in all it was good and the staff was very helpful, I would stay there again ” InterContinental Mark Hopkins San Francisco “ Overall I had a nice experience. The room was nicely furnished, the staff were prompt and attentive, check out was easy, and the location is right next to San Francisco's upscale shopping areas. The embarcaderro center is pretty close, and so is union square. And all the riff riff from union square kind of keep their distance because the hotel is located atop of a very steep hill. ” Cova Hotel “ The Cova Hotel was a very nice hotel in San Francisco. It was clean with cozy beds, a nice included free breakfast and a free shuttle to points of interest such as Union Square and Fisherman's Wharf. It has a very nice roof top terrace with views of the city which was great for those of us who smoke. Staff was so nice and helpful..giving us directions,suggestions of places to eat,etc. The parking for your car was on site and the cost reasonable in comparison to other hotels. ” Nob Hill Inn “ We had the best room at the Inn. We were scrambling after finding out our cruise was delayed a day and needed to spend the night in San Francisco. We are so fortunate to have found this as rooms were being snapped up quickly all over the downtown area. This has been the best Inn we have stayed at in 30 years of marriage. ” Popular Hotels in San Francisco Serrano Hotel Union Square 4 stars 7.7 Good 705 reviews Handlery Union Square Hotel 3 stars 7.9 Booking.com is part of The Priceline Group, the world leader in online travel & related services. Verified reviews from real guests. We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from real, verified guests. How does it work? 1 It starts with a booking The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property. 2 Followed by a trip When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more. 3 And finally, a review After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site. If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.
